name.description: The name of the conference, could include both conference family and location.

location.description: Usually a combination of city + country.

year.description: The year this instance of the conference ran.

totalSpeakers.description: How many unique speakers were scheduled as speaking at the conference (doesn't include unconference).

numberOfWomen.description: How many of the totalSpeakers identify as women, at least according to my ability to judge based on name/pronoun.

source.description: The URL listing the scheduled speakers for this instance of the conference.

dateAdded.description: When was this conference data added.

confDate.description: The first day this instance of the conference ran.

Notes.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

Status.description: What status is the information for this conference.
